name: voicemeeter-windows-volume
description: Tray app that allows you to sync windows volume and mute state to Voicemeeter volume controls
author: Frosthaven

scripts.icon_dir: npx mkdirp _build/assets/default && npx mkdirp _build/assets/light npx mkdirp _build/assets/dark && rimraf mkdirp && rimraf npx
scripts.icon_base_default: npm run icon_dir && magick convert ./src/assets/prebuild/icon-32.png -resize 32x32 ./_build/assets/default/icon-32.png && magick convert ./src/assets/prebuild/icon-32.png -resize 16x16 ./_build/assets/default/icon-16.png && magick convert ./src/assets/prebuild/icon-128.png -resize 64x64 ./_build/assets/default/icon-64.png  && magick convert ./src/assets/prebuild/icon-128.png -resize 128x128 ./_build/assets/default/icon-128.png
scripts.icon_base_dark: magick convert _build/assets/default/icon-16.png xc:"#ffffff" -channel RGB -clut  _build/assets/dark/icon-16.png && magick convert _build/assets/default/icon-32.png xc:"#ffffff" -channel RGB -clut  _build/assets/dark/icon-32.png && magick convert _build/assets/default/icon-64.png xc:"#ffffff" -channel RGB -clut  _build/assets/dark/icon-64.png && magick convert _build/assets/default/icon-128.png xc:"#ffffff" -channel RGB -clut  _build/assets/dark/icon-128.png
scripts.icon_base_light: magick convert _build/assets/default/icon-16.png xc:"#000000" -channel RGB -clut  _build/assets/light/icon-16.png && magick convert _build/assets/default/icon-32.png xc:"#000000" -channel RGB -clut  _build/assets/light/icon-32.png && magick convert _build/assets/default/icon-64.png xc:"#000000" -channel RGB -clut  _build/assets/light/icon-64.png && magick convert _build/assets/default/icon-128.png xc:"#000000" -channel RGB -clut  _build/assets/light/icon-128.png
scripts.icon: npm run icon_dir && npm run icon_base_default && npm run icon_base_dark && npm run icon_base_light && npm run icon_default && npm run icon_dark && npm run icon_light
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run icon && npm run meta && npm run build_webpack && npm run copy_bundle && npm run build_nexe && npm run build_installer && npm run archive
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run icon && npm run meta && npm run build_webpack && node ./build-tools/build.nexe.js clean && node ./build-tools/build.nexe.js && npm run build_installer && npm run archive
